answerText: neutrinos[10] There exist three flavors of neutrinos: electron, muon and this third flavor.
heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | Penn A + Chicago B | 2 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Like neutral B mesons, these particles can oscillate between several different flavors. For 10 points each: [10] Name these neutral particles with a very small mass that only interact via the weak force. They were detected by Cowan and Reines using giant tanks of chlorine.
